ai-tha-ap4:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap4:1.4_0: at the fore of the heaven of the gods.
ai-tha-ap4:2.3_0: What’s the sphere of sensual pleasures?
ai-tha-ap4:3.4_0: And they had urged him to go.
ai-tha-ap4:4.1_0: While the Vajjis are dried up,
ai-tha-ap4:5.1_0: if he invites a fully awakened Buddha;
ai-tha-ap4:5.4_0: I flew off time to pass away.
ai-tha-ap4:6.1_0: With the ending of all defilements,
ai-tha-ap4:6.2_0: the world is surrounded by the world.
ai-tha-ap4:6.3_0: sun and moon in every direction
ai-tha-ap4:8.1_0: He has compassion for all beings,
ai-tha-ap4:9.4_0: he will go to the realm of the gods.
ai-tha-ap4:11.2_0: and a wheel-turning monarch will become a wheel-turning monarch.
ai-tha-ap4:12.2_0: a family born in this life,
ai-tha-ap4:12.4_0: The Teacher will be in the world.
ai-tha-ap4:13.2_0: you’ll fall into the human realm.
ai-tha-ap4:13.4_0: thinking, “There will be the supreme penalty.”
ai-tha-ap4:14.3_0: Gotama, the disciple of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap4:14.4_0: For a second disciple will be his disciple.
ai-tha-ap4:16.3_0: I never paid homage to anyone:
ai-tha-ap4:18.1_0: This is the last time for me;
ai-tha-ap4:18.3_0: Here I used to be a human being,
ai-tha-ap4:21.2_0: and no conceit is found in me.
ai-tha-ap4:21.4_0: I took note of the mind.
ai-tha-ap4:22.2_0: since I long for my deeds,
ai-tha-ap4:22.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap4:23.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap4:23.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap4:23.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap4:24.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mahāmoggallāna.
